name: Heroic Labs
headline: Social Infrastructure for Games; Makers of Nakama game server, Satori√¢¬Ä¬¶
description:
At Heroic Labs, we proudly present our comprehensive suite of products, meticulously designed to address the multifaceted demands of the contemporary gaming industry. Our cornerstone offerings√¢¬Ä¬îNakama, Hiro, Satori, and Heroic Cloud√¢¬Ä¬îcomprise the Heroic Game Stack, an integrated platform delivering unparalleled performance and flexibility.

Heroic Labs is a company by a team of engineers with backgrounds in distributed databases, big data analytics and high-volume mobile application APIs, and game development. We want to make it effortless for any game studio to build beautiful social and multiplayer games which work at massive scale.

founders.name: Andrei Mihu, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Founder of @heroiclabs. Scalable systems, high availability design, high-performance data processing and interoperability.

founders.name: Chris Molozian, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder of @heroiclabs. A software engineer and tinkerer on distributed systems.

## A Heroic Solution for Every Problem
We solve the toughest development, scaling and operational challenges for the world‚Äôs largest online games. Whether you‚Äôre building for mobile, console, PC, or cross platform, we‚Äôve got the product solutions to help you innovate and reduce risk.
[![Feature illustration](http://heroiclabs.com/images/pages/index/nakama.2c33fc92ddcc83a32f714a5668d89cccf7f29826629ee1becb925ac761e54b2e.svg)](http://heroiclabs.com/</nakama/>)
## [Nakama](http://heroiclabs.com/</nakama/>)
The hugely popular open source game server framework, packed with competitive, social and multiplayer features for online games. Take back control of your game server and own your data.
  * [Add social gameplay](http://heroiclabs.com/</social/>)
  * [Build rich multiplayer experiences](http://heroiclabs.com/</multiplayer/>)
  * [Grow competitive communities](http://heroiclabs.com/</competitive/>)
  * [Customise with JavaScript, Go and Lua](http://heroiclabs.com/</customization/>)


[![Feature illustration](http://heroiclabs.com/images/pages/index/hiro.7924934c92842caefb7fbad594ae52ee8b45eef04ecf26b8f942080749c81045.svg)](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
## [Hiro](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
An opinionated high-level game development toolkit to rapidly build meta game features with Nakama. Reduce the cost of development and deliver high quality meta game engagement.
  * [Complex economy models for soft/hard currencies](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
  * [Use energy accumulators to give rewards](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
  * [Offer video Ad watches as a way to obtain rewards](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
  * [Send analytics events to multiple services (e.g Satori)](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)
  * [Comprehensive JSON definition to drive Hiro behaviour](http://heroiclabs.com/</hiro/>)


[![Feature illustration](http://heroiclabs.com/images/pages/index/satori.57c2acea7ec3891f17cdf92610b779741aec9c7549496ebc3d22a6ee092d2823.svg)](http://heroiclabs.com/</satori/>)
## [Satori](http://heroiclabs.com/</satori/>)
Live operations to know your players, understand engagement and deliver features and events. Segment players, optimize retention, and grow engagement and revenue.
  * [Scalable event capture pipeline](http://heroiclabs.com/</satori/events/>)
  * [Auto-calculate properties based on events](http://heroiclabs.com/</satori/segmentation/>)
  * [Create audience, and visualise metrics and retention](http://heroiclabs.com/</satori/analytics/>)
  * [Set up live events to drive audience engagement](http://heroiclabs.com/</docs/satori/concepts/live-events/>)
  * [Set up multi-phase experiments and feature flags](http://heroiclabs.com/</docs/satori/concepts/experiments/>)


[![Feature illustration](http://heroiclabs.com/images/pages/index/cloud.5dfe886e0898f561b91943caaeae413ff9d18e52489dcd9497dbf079f83d749f.svg)](http://heroiclabs.com/</heroic-cloud/>)
## [Heroic Cloud](http://heroiclabs.com/</heroic-cloud/>)
Deploy dedicated Nakama and Satori clusters on a robust and scalable managed and private cloud. A full-stack game cloud to take you from concept to chart topper.
  * [Dedicated cloud resources deployment](http://heroiclabs.com/</docs/heroic-cloud/concepts/projects/>)
  * [Scale easily within few seconds with no downtime](http://heroiclabs.com/</heroic-cloud/>)
  * [Tightly-knit integration pipeline for Nakama runtime](http://heroiclabs.com/</docs/heroic-cloud/concepts/builders/>)
  * [Set up an organization and invite team members to projects](http://heroiclabs.com/<docs/heroic-cloud/concepts/organizations/>)
  * [Leverage your existing AWS relationship and incentives](http://heroiclabs.com/</aws/>)

generated_description:
**Heroic Labs Overview**

Founded in 2014 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S15, Heroic Labs is a London-based company transforming the gaming landscape with what they call "social infrastructure for games." At the heart of their operations is the Heroic Game Stack, an integrated suite of products designed to tackle the complex requirements of modern game development. Their key offerings include:

- **Nakama**: An open-source game server ideal for building social and multiplayer games.
- **Hiro**: A toolkit for rapidly developing standardized meta-game features.
- **Satori**: A platform focused on live operations, analytics, and audience engagement.
- **Heroic Cloud**: A managed or private cloud service tailored for scaling their game stack effectively.

Heroic Labs aims to empower game studios, regardless of size, to create visually stunning and seamless social gaming experiences. The team comprises 21 dedicated engineers with expertise in distributed databases, big data analytics, mobile application APIs, and game development. Their mission is to make multiplayer gaming as light as a feather and as engaging as a blockbuster hit.

**Current Activities & Community Engagement**

Heroic Labs is actively participating in the gaming community by hosting events like the GDC Executive Brunch. They're also well-connected on platforms like GitHub and Twitter, encouraging community engagement through forums and case studies that showcase their technology's impact on the industry.

**Notable Achievements**

The company prides itself on impressive metrics:
- Over 800,000 developers leveraging their technology.
- More than $2 billion in annual revenue attributed to their solutions.
- More than 8 million SDK downloads, showcasing widespread adoption.

Their technologies are trusted by major gaming companies including Electronic Arts, Zynga, and Unity Technologies, emphasizing their reputation in the market.

**Final Thoughts**

Heroic Labs embodies a forward-thinking approach, emphasizing flexibility, performance, and community support in game development. If you‚Äôre a game studio looking to elevate your multiplayer offerings and operational efficiency, Heroic Labs is worth your time. Visit [Heroic Labs](http://heroiclabs.com) to explore how they can help your games soar.
